did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: This collection includes newsletters, fliers, and reports from the Department of Geology at the College of William and Mary.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: College of William and Mary, Dept. of Geology Records, Special Collections Research Center, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Box and folder list compiled by Kelsey Kavanaugh in April 2009.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Housed in McGlothlin-Street Hall on the historic Old Campus of the College. Our departmental space includes a large classroom dedicated to upper-level lectures, introductory laboratories, and departmental seminars. We have three teaching laboratories for upper level courses and a dedicated computer lab with an array of networked Macs, PCs, and ample printing facilities Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Dept. of Geology.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes newsletters, fliers, and reports from the Department of Geology at the College of William and Mary.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
